I have downloaded this file and there are no viruses and they installed fine. Keygens worked and everything.

But whenever I try to run the game, it just loads, gives me a grey screen and shuts down. No error messages or anything. Just the game shuts down. I am running Windows XP and have mounted it on Daemon Tools. I tried to make it compatible with Windows 95/98/NT/2000 but nothing happens. Any solution please?

Weasel_Weevil - Try downloading and installing a No-CD Crack.

Or you can try updating DirectX / Updating your video card drivers

For those of you who are looking for something new but similar there is a free online game called Tribes:Ascend.It is similar to Unreal tournament and Quake , it is very dinamic everyone is equipped with a jetpack and jet boots that allow you to "ski".It is a lot of fun, here is a link for those who want to try it out : https://account.hirezstudios.com/tribesascend/?referral=1263875&utm_campaign=email
